ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to add a Horizontal line Annotation and drag via the mouse, recoloring the series when series-values pass a certain threshold
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20HorizontalLineAnnotation%20Type.html']HorizontalLineAnnotation[/url] and a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Column%20Series%20Type.html']FastColumnRenderableSeries[/url] can interact in an MVVM example to dynamically color the column-series bars based on the threshold value.
Drag the line to see the colors of the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Column%20Series%20Type.html']FastColumnRenderableSeries[/url] change whenever the data-value is greater than the threshold.
Re-coloring of bars is provided by the RedIfOverThresholdPaletteProvider, a custom class which implements [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.PaletteProviders.IFillPaletteProvider.html']IFillPaletteProvider[/url] and [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.PaletteProviders.IStrokePaletteProvider.html']IStrokePaletteProvider[/url] and is attached to the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseRenderableSeries~PaletteProvider.html']BaseRenderableSeries.PaletteProvider[/url] property. Using this method you can re-color data-points in Column, Line, OHLC and Candlestick Series depending on their data-value.
